languages.text: Корабельное орудие, стреляющее торпедами. Торпеды имеют шанс нанести {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}прямое попадание{/g} или урон по области при ручном подрыве или промахе (в этом случае детонация происходит от {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}неконтактного взрывателя{/g}).
A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.
languages.original_text: Корабельное орудие, стреляющее торпедами. Торпеды имеют шанс нанести {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}прямое попадание{/g} или урон по области при ручном подрыве или промахе (в этом случае детонация происходит от {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}неконтактного взрывателя{/g}).

traits.locale_text: A ship's weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

A ship's weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.
A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.
A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

languages.text: Eine Raumschiffwaffe, die Torpedos abfeuert. Torpedos können einen direkten Treffer landen oder beim Verfehlen Flächenschaden verursachen (sie detonieren mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g}), oder wenn sie manuell gezündet werden.
languages.original_text: A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

traits.locale_text: Eine Raumschiffwaffe, die Torpedos abfeuert. Torpedos können einen {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direkten Treffer{/g} landen oder beim Verfehlen Flächenschaden verursachen (sie detonieren mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}Annäherungszünder{/g}), oder wenn sie manuell gezündet werden.

languages.text: Arme de vaisseau spatial permettant de lancer des torpilles. Les torpilles peuvent infliger un coup direct, ou des dégâts de zone si elles manquent leur cible (explosion déclenchée par une {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}) ou si elles sont déclenchées manuellement.
languages.original_text: A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

traits.locale_text: Arme de vaisseau spatial permettant de {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}lancer{/g} des torpilles. Les torpilles peuvent infliger un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}coup direct{/g}, ou des dégâts de zone si elles manquent leur cible (en explosant sur une {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}fusée de proximité{/g}) ou si elles sont déclenchées manuellement.

languages.text: 用来发射鱼雷的虚空舰武器。鱼雷既可以通过直接命中来造成伤害，也可以在未命中（通过{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}引爆）或手动引爆时，造成范围伤害。
languages.original_text: A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

traits.locale_text: 用来发射鱼雷的虚空舰武器。{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}{/g}鱼雷既可以通过{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直接命中{/g}来造成伤害，也可以在未命中（通过{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近炸引信{/g}引爆）或手动引爆时，造成范围伤害。

languages.original_text: A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}direct hit{/g} or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

languages.text: Un arma de nave del vacío que dispara torpedos. Los torpedos pueden infligir un impacto directo o daño de área al fallar (con un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g}) o al detonarlos manualmente.
languages.original_text: A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

traits.locale_text: Un arma de nave del vacío que {g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}dispara{/g} torpedos. Los torpedos pueden infligir un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}impacto directo{/g} o daño de área al fallar (con un {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}detonador de proximidad{/g}) o al detonarlos manualmente.

languages.text: 魚雷を発射するヴォイドシップ兵器。魚雷は直撃が可能で、外す（{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}による起爆）または手動で起爆するとエリアダメージを与えることができる。
languages.original_text: A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.

traits.locale_text: 魚雷を{g|Encyclopedia:InternalFiresSpace}発射{/g}するヴォイドシップ兵器。魚雷は{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}直撃{/g}が可能で、外す（{g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}近接信管{/g}による起爆）または手動で起爆するとエリアダメージを与えることができる。

languages.text: Torpido fırlatan bir uçsuz gemisi silahı. Torpido, doğrudan vuruş yapabileceği gibi; ({g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}yakınlık fünyesi{/g} ile patlatıldığında) ıska hâlinde veya manuel olarak patlatıldığında alan hasarı da verebilir.
languages.original_text: A voidship weapon that fires torpedoes. Torpedoes can land a direct hit or deal area damage on a miss (detonating on a {g|Encyclopedia:DirectHitSpace}proximity fuse{/g}) or when detonated manually.
